ygData.subject: RE: RE: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Woot! Glad it worked for you Deidre. Wow, mom was wrong, I actually AM good for something. Heh. The blank Inventory persona screen is indeed normal now. I
ygData.messageBody:
Woot! Glad it worked for you Deidre. Wow, mom was wrong, I actually AM good for something. Heh.

The blank Inventory persona screen is indeed "normal" now. I too found it quite useful, altho it wasn't to look at my pretty face, I liked seeing what was happening behind me when I looted something.


Rob C.


>From: "Deidre Choksy" <electrum101@...>
>Subject: Re: RE: Question

>I was told they did away with this feature but I found
>a workaround myself.
>
>If you load the luclin images BUT use the old UI, you
>can hit inventory and then hit the face button.

>What's UI stand for? I tried what you suggested below and it actually
>worked! I adjusted my face and waited forever for my character to save. >Then my face stayed the same through multiple zones! And it's finely >correct on the character selection screen! However, my inventory picture >is still black!? I guess I'll just go to tech support chat...


> > Remove head gear/masks. Pick your desired features
> > using the /face command. Force a character save.
> > Zone into another area, still without head gear.
> > Check yourself, you should be "yourself". If
> > not...start over and try again. If you are okay,
> > then you should be okay and can put back on head
> > gear/masks. Remember, this is if it's happening to
> > you only.
> >
